name: Glitched Cook
description:
EPILEPSY WARNING: This game may cause some strain on the eyes. If you think you may be affected by this, please turn back now. (you're not missing much don't worry)

Want a simple grid-based puzzle game?
How about a spirit animal tiger?
A ninja cheff?
What about quantom superposition?
Why not all of the above? This game mixes and mashes everything into one simple game.

This game was made in a very relaxed 10 days for the 8-bits to infinity TigerJ(am) #3 game jam (2022) (phew, what a mouthful). The limitation was a 5 color palette and the requirement that at least one tiger exists in the game. In addition the semi-optional theme was [sdrawkcab si gnihtyrevE] (Everything is backwards).

12 short puzzle levels with very few puzzle mechanics and color play.

CONTROLS:
WASD to move the cheff.
SDWA (wasd backwards) to move the tiger.
R to return to the level select menu (no move-cancelling, sorry, run out of time)

Credits:
Code - Glitched Json (me!)
Art      - Glitched Json (me again!)
Background Music - Kevin MacLeod (incompetch.com)
